summary: This bill, the U.S. Bicycle Production and Assembly Act, aims to temporarily modify tariffs on imported bicycle parts for assembly and manufacturing within the United States. It introduces a new tariff heading for duty-free entry of bicycle parts, defines these parts and the manufacturing process, and outlines requirements for importers.  It mandates a report on the impact of these changes within five years and grants rule-making authority to U.S. Customs and Border Protection. The act has a 10-year effective period.
